title: The Reveler Series Complete Boxed Set
description: "READ THIS SERIES! It's unique, fresh, captivating, enthralling, and action-packed. I highly recommend this serial to all paranormal romance and urban fantasy lovers!" - LITERAL ADDICTIONThe Complete Reveler SeriesThe Reveler Series is a hot paranormal romantic suspense serial set in a world where shared dreaming is a new pop culture phenomenon that allows people to indulge their wildest fantasies. But there are also unknown dangers Darkside; nightmares are slowly infiltrating not only dreams but the Waking World as well.Dream Dangerously.The Reveler Series includes:1.	Darkness Falls2.	Lay Me Down3.	Darksider4.	Night's Deep Hush5.	Bring Me A Dream6.	Delirium7.	The Sandman8.	Scrape"What a spellbinding conclusion to this fantastic series! I have been enthralled with the dark, edgy world and sexy characters from the very beginning and while I hate to see it end, there is no better way that it could have concluded." - Evampire's review of Scrape, the stunning conclusion of the Reveler Series
author: Erin Kellison
